name: mimekit
description: Guidance for MimeKit and MailKit email libraries in .NET. USE FOR: creating and parsing MIME email messages, sending email via SMTP with MailKit, reading email via IMAP/POP3, attachments, HTML email, S/MIME and PGP signing/encryption. DO NOT USE FOR: SMS/voice messaging (use twilio), HTTP APIs (use ASP.NET Core), custom TCP protocols (use dotnetty), gRPC services (use grpc-dotnet).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
